column2: You have a knowledge of taxonomy, metadata and the organization of digital assets to ensure the platform is delivering the desired assets/results. You understand that our studios and clients need to make stuff - fast. You will optimize workflows for getting assets in and out of the DAM. You will be part of a team that evaluate clients needs for organization and search requirements so finding assets in the DAM is extremely easy and intuitive. You will track and apply usage rights, following the asset lifecycle to prevent any misuse or untimely release of assets. You will understand the role of DAM as the core of our production technology stack. JOB RESPONSIBILITIES o Organize, catalog, tag and publish assets going into the Craft DAM ecosystem. o Create, manage and apply appropriate usage rights records to assets in the Craft DAM to prevent the misuse or untimely release of assets. o Manage and process asset fulfillment requests and workflows. o Supporting MWG and Crafts values o Be part of an environment of mutual respect and partnership, strategic thinking, appropriate risk taking, open lines of communication, on-going performance feedback, professional development, and adherence to agency policy. Location-Lower Parel

column2: NITYO INFOTECH is looking for Data Scientist - Lead to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey       Team Leadership: Lead and manage a team of data scientists, data analysts, and related professionals     Set team goals, allocate resources, provide mentorship, and oversee project execution     Project Management: Manage data science projects from inception to completion     Define project scope, objectives, timelines, and deliverables     Ensure that projects are executed efficiently and meet organizational goals     Data Strategy: Develop and execute a data strategy that aligns with the organization's business objectives     Determine which data sources and analytical techniques are most relevant for solving specific problems     Advanced Analytics: Utilize advanced statistical and machine learning techniques to analyze complex data sets, extract insights, and build predictive models     Translate technical findings into actionable business recommendations     Model Development: Oversee the development and deployment of machine learning models and algorithms for various applications, such as customer segmentation, demand forecasting, fraud detection, or recommendation systems     Data Governance: Establish and enforce data governance policies and standards     Ensure data quality, security, and compliance with relevant regulations (g, GDPR, HIPAA)
column11: customer segmentation, Project management, Analytical, Demand forecasting, Machine learning, HIPAA, data governance, model development, Data quality, Fraud detection

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Enterprise Data Architect with expertise in Azure Cloud and Data Ingestion Systems to join our team      As an Enterprise Data Architect, you will play a crucial role in designing and implementing scalable and efficient data ingestion systems and strategies, leveraging Azure Cloud technologies      Your expertise in Azure and data ingestion will be essential in ensuring seamless, reliable, and accurate data processing and integration across our enterprise          Responsibilities:        Knowledge and experience in Lake house architecture .      Strong knowledge Experience in Snowflake.      Experience in Azure storages(Data lake store gen2) databases(Synapse , SqlDB Cosmos)      Experience in structure semi structure(XML Json) data ingestion.      Design and develop end-to-end data ingestion frameworks and solutions using Azure Cloud services, ensuring efficient and reliable data integration from various sources into our enterprise data ecosystem.      Collaborate with business stakeholders, data scientists, data engineers, and software developers to understand data requirements and design the most suitable data ingestion strategies and architectures.              Evaluate and select appropriate Azure Cloud services for data ingestion, including Azure Data Factory, Kafka , PySpark and others, based on project requirements.      Define and implement data ingestion patterns and best practices, considering data governance, security, privacy, scalability, and performance requirements.      Develop and maintain data pipeline orchestration and monitoring frameworks to ensure the smooth and reliable operation of data ingestion processes.        Optimize data ingestion workflows and architectures to support real-time and batch processing of large volumes of data from    diverse sources.      Implement data quality checks, error handling, and data validation mechanisms within data ingestion systems to ensure data accuracy and integrity.      Stay up-to-date with the latest Azure Cloud technologies and industry trends related to data ingestion and recommend improvements and enhancements to existing processes.      Collaborate with other data architects, database administrators, and infrastructure teams to ensure the integration of data ingestion systems with data storage, data processing, and data analytics solutions.      Provide technical guidance and mentorship to data engineers and data integration teams, fostering knowledge sharing and promoting best practices.                Requirements:        Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Data Engineering, or a related field.      8+ years of experience as a Data Architect or similar role, with expertise in data ingestion systems and Azure Cloud.      Strong proficiency in Azure Cloud services and tools for data ingestion, such as Azure Data Factory, Azure Event Hubs, Azure Stream Analytics, Azure Logic Apps, and others.      Proven experience in designing and implementing complex data ingestion frameworks and architectures for large-scale enterprise environments.      In-depth understanding of data ingestion patterns, data integration techniques, and best practices.      Solid understanding of data governance, data security, and privacy requirements.      Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, SQL, or Scala for data manipulation and transformation.      Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to architect and troubleshoot complex data ingestion systems.      Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.      Relevant certifications in Azure Cloud and/or Data Engineering is a plus
column11: data security, XML, Data processing, JSON, Data quality, Analytics, Monitoring, SQL, Python

column1: Database Administration (DBA)- PostgreSQL / MySQL / Other Rdbms
column2: Job   Summary:   The role involves designing and developing solutions to support the business needs. Optimizing and tuning existing programs and developing new routines will be integral to the profile. Key   Responsibility   Areas: Architect, Design and Develop solutions to support business requirements.  Use skill sets to Analyze and manage a variety of database environments such as Oracle, Postgres, Cassandra, MySql, Graph DB, etc Provide optimal database environment design, analyse complex distributed production deployments, and make recommendations to optimize performance. Work closely with programming teams to deliver high-quality software. Provide innovative solutions to complex business and technology problems. Propose the best solution in Logical and Physical Data Modelling. Perform Administration tasks including DB resource planning and DB tuning. Mentor and train junior developers, lead & manage teams. Qualification : B.Tech in Computer Science or related experience. Experience:  9+ years of experience in a Database Admin role. Skill   Sets   /   Requirements: Experience in designing/architect database solutions Experience with multiple RDBMS of TB data size preferably Oracle, PostgreSQL, Cassandra and Graph DB, along with big data technologies and DWH. Must be well versed in PL/SQL & PostgreSQL and Strong Query Optimization skills. Expert knowledge in DB installation, configuration, replication, upgradation, security and HADR set-up. Experience in database deployment, performance and troubleshooting issues. Knowledge of scripting languages (such as Unix, shell, PHP). Advanced knowledge of PostgreSQL will be preferred. Should have experience working with Cloud Platforms and Services (AWS/Azure/GCP). Experience with migrating database environments from one platform to another. Ability to work well under pressure.
